property.name: sentry.service.security.mode
property.description: Options: kerberos, other, none. Authentication mode for Sentry service.

property.name: sentry.service.client.server.rpc-address
property.description: TCP address of the sentry store server

property.name: sentry.service.client.server.rpc-port
property.description: Port # of the sentry store server

property.name: sentry.service.client.server.rpc-connection-timeout
property.description: Client timeout default(200000) RPC connection timeout in milisecs

property.name: sentry.metastore.service.users
property.description: Comma separated list of users List of service users (eg hive, impala) to bypass the Sentry metastore authorization. These services handle the metadata authorization on their side.

property.name: sentry.hive.server
property.description: Deprecated name: hive.sentry.server. Defaut: HS2. Hive Server2 Server identifier like "server1"

property.name: sentry.hive.provider.backend
property.description: Options: {org.apache.sentry.provider.db.SimpleDBProviderBackend, org.apache.sentry.provider.file.SimpleFileProviderBackend} Privilege provider to be used, we support file based or db based
